archives.quote: They did not fear our steel, but the smoke that rose from southern ruins.
archives.author: Letter from Inquisitor M. Varela, 1493

archives.quote: On the ninth night, the jungle sang back to us. Our torches would not stay lit.
archives.author: Journal of Captain J. Strode

archives.quote: Blood on the pyramid steps opened a wound in the sky; we glimpsed something vast.
archives.author: Testimony of Seeker L. de Rojas

archives.quote: The stone idols breathe. Some say they dream. Pray they never awaken.
archives.author: Codex Margin Note, unknown author
